entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicListener #67560
  • Hang while waiting for runtime to suspend thread in busy loop #67559
  • [release/7.0-preview3] Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #67558
  • [Localization] Confirm English sentence #67556
  • [Localization] Improvement for English resouce #67555
  • Incorrect behavior of the ToString () method when converting DateTime by format string #67562
  • [API Proposal]: Make some System.Net.Security functions/properties public for System.Net.Quic #67552
  • .NET 7.0.100-preview.2.22153.17 crash on RHEL 8+arm64 #67551
  • [release/preview3] Test failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject #67549
  • [arm64] Perf_FileStream.FlushAsync benchmark hangs on Debian 11 #67545
  • [Question] ReadyToRun (crossgen2) debug dll have "optimized" DebugInfo section, that does not allow set breakpoint. #67541
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Default Interface Implementation of Static Virtual Methods #67540
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] ILLinker update broke wasm builds #67538
  • [NativeAOT] Httpclient timeout #67537
  • Fix System.Text.Json source code annotation RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute by moving it to class level #67536
  • GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs returns incorrect declaring type #67533
    7.0.0
  • Binder should update the input array #67531
    Future
  • Increase the size of the regex cache #67530
  • HttpClientHandler.SupportsAutomaticDecompression throws PlatformNotSupportedException on net6.0-maccatalyst #67529
  • Consider deleting CallingConventions.cs #67519
    Future
  • [Question]Is there a sample for tracking the http request time? #67518

Closed

  • [android][mono] Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests #66241
  • Crossgen2 - switch over signatures to use eager serialization #41988
    Future
  • ReadyToRunCodegenNodeFactory cleanup / refactor #13386
    7.0.0
  • SQL DB Events collected via DiagnosticSourceEventSource don't include stacks #64020
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchF\\NewtE\\NewtE\\NewtE.cmd #60238
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\xxobj\\operand\\refanyval\\refanyval.cmd #60278
  • Use REP MOVSB on Ice Lake+ for locals init #66872
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\explicit\\misc\\_relexplicit1\\_relexplicit1.cmd #60952
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_rellcsval\\_rellcsval.cmd #61338
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Arrays\\lcs\\_speed_rellcsbox\\_speed_rellcsbox.cmd #61646
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\eh\\leaves\\oponerror_ro\\oponerror_ro.cmd #62695
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\gc_poll\\InsertGCPoll\\InsertGCPoll.cmd #63033
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\StaticVirtualMethods\\NegativeTestCases\\UnimplementedAbstractMethodOnAbstractClass\\UnimplementedAbstractMethodOnAbstractClass.cmd #63180
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\MDArray\\GaussJordan\\plainarr_cs_d\\plainarr_cs_d.cmd #64362
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\gc\\misc\\structfp1_3\\structfp1_3.cmd #64887
  • Test failure JIT\\Generics\\ConstrainedCall\\vt1_il_d\\vt1_il_d.cmd #65170
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_18522\\GitHub_18522_2\\GitHub_18522_2.cmd #65348
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\generics\\Instantiation\\Negative\\Type_ofT_Inherit_FromT\\Type_ofT_Inherit_FromT.cmd #65349
  • Test failure profiler\\eventpipe\\reverse_startup\\reverse_startup.cmd #65352
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\MinLeakGen\\minleakgen\\minleakgen.cmd #65354
  • Test failure profiler\\unittest\\metadatagetdispenser\\metadatagetdispenser.cmd #65645
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\inl\\caninline_ro\\caninline_ro.cmd #65647
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\threadpool\\bindhandle\\bindhandle1\\bindhandle1.cmd #65685
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Lzcnt\\Lzcnt_ro\\Lzcnt_ro.cmd #66689
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\Boxing\\seh\\try_il_r\\try_il_r.cmd #65686
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\rngchk\\ArrayWithThread_o\\ArrayWithThread_o.cmd #65687
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\localloc\\eh\\eh03_small\\eh03_small.cmd #65883
    7.0.0
  • Test failure profiler\\transitions\\transitions\\transitions.cmd #66049
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\Monitor\\EnterExit08\\EnterExit08.cmd #66370
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\osr\\osr001\\osr001.cmd #66441
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse41\\ConvertToVector128_ro\\ConvertToVector128_ro.cmd #66629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444.sh #66690
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector128\\Fma_r\\Fma_r.cmd #66926
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r.cmd #67019
  • Please add a stable sorting algorithm to the base library (eg timsort or rust-style) #67546
  • [release/preview3] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests failures #67547
  • Cookie header values should be separated by semi-colon not comma. #42856
    Future
  • Support custom type generated marshalling on prior to net7 tfms #67390
  • [mini] gshared: Implement static virtual method `constrained.ldftn` in the JIT #61672
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.json deserialize doesn't support case insensitive Hashset #67311
  • Enumerable.Chunk throws OutOfMemoryException for very large chunk sizes. #67132
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyProperties ignores collections #67514
  • [API Proposal]: Of method for List #67431
  • [API Proposal]: Optional class for less if-else usage #67432

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable deleting call counting stubs #67563
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [infrastructure] Update Windows server queue #67554
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.Tests` for #67550
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-clean-ci
  • Recursive validation for Options #67548
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Fix createdump on Unix platforms that do not implement process_vm_readv #67544
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #67543
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests] Re-enable generic math Create tests on iOS #67542
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67534
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 6.0.x
  • Project file hygiene #67532
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta
  • Split Reflection and SourceGen TypeInfos #67526
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Don't detect link on path #67525
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip crossgen restore when running in source build #67521
    area-Setup
  • Allow custom IExternalScopeProvider in LoggerFactory via DI #67520
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution

Merged

  • Updating the generic math interfaces according to the last API review #67453
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix handling of makeref/refvalue in generic code #67523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make handling of invalid code more robust #67524
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable some interop tests on Win-ARM32 #67553
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-windows, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Some test fixes #67373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix parent test folder name #67528
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Concatenate multiple cookies with semicolon #67455
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Updated branch name, from master to main. #67522
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable tests/profiler/eventpipe/eventpipe on JIT stress runs #66473
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Align nodes when `!SupportsRelativePointers` #67516
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices` #67512
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Manually update C# compiler version to a more recent preview #67440
  • [Group 7] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console` #67459
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Don't force `TieredCompilation=0` for SuperPMI replay job #67489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd` #67513
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [AOT] Don't set the 'CorrectedSynthesize' flag in the objc_imageinfo section. #67441
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
    area-Meta
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add ProcessorCount Event to RuntimeEventSource #65581
    area-System.Diagnostics, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • First commit for ppc64le support #67378
    area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • setting GenerateAssemblyInfo to false [csproj] disables EnablePreviewFeatures with no warning [analyser?] #24700

Closed

  • testhost exited with error: Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #22828

PullRequests

Created

  • Restrict default file inclusion of Windows App SDK files to only happen if specific properties are set #24704
  • Revert "deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools" #24701
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert "deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools" #24702
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1699113 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Auto-default structs #5737
  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash when params array used with reordered attribute arguments #60572
    17.3
  • Add code refactoring to use enum name value instead of integer value #60571
  • Ensure Top level statements appear in the entry point list #60570
  • Add Tools Options Telemetry #60569
  • `[ReadOnly]Span<T>` fields and properties in a `ref struct` can have a `stackalloc` as a default value #60568
  • VS's Go To Definition disassembler handles static interface methods incorrectly #60567
  • Add telemetry for EditorConfig rules #60566
  • Incorrect define constant use in BuildServerConnection.cs #60553
  • "Inline temporary variable" introduces an unnecessary cast that's reported as nullability issue #60552
  • SARIF Error Logger - Should include the analyzers(rules) that where used #60550

Closed

  • Disable IDE0004 (Remove unnecessary cast) for explicit cast of 0 to enum type #60457
    Backlog
  • Add Correctness_Rebuild to the README badges #51246
    17.1
  • Visual Studio's undo and redo button don't work for ruleset files #1600
    Backlog
  • Add PredefinedCode{Fix,Refactor}ProviderNames to CodeAction.CustomTags to identify analyzers\fixers for telemetry #4919
    Backlog
  • Need an analyzer to catch re-used analyzer IDs #2656
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Make NotificationOption2 a serializable struct #60573
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options - take 2 #60565
    Area-IDE
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Support built-in unsigned right shift operators. #60560
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Colorize `async` as keyword in some cases #60558
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove some 'MyCodeAction's #60557
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Avoid using --blame-crash with CollectDumps #60561
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add Rebuild badge to README #60298
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update PublishData.json for 17.3 P1 #60559
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Note auto-default merged in feature status doc #60564
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Remove unnecessary `<Compile Remove` #60538
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Update Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzers and remove RS0005 suppressions #60556
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support parsing for Unsigned Right Shift operator #60501
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Cleanup unused resources in Features layer #60554
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge 'main-vs-deps' into UnsignedRightShift #60551
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Use provider type name for CodeAction telemetry for code actions... #60480
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused abstract property `CodeFixCategory` #60536
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60574
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove IDynamicFileInfo-added syntax trees to attempt to improve perf #60531
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to main #60515
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Move formatting analyzer to `Analyzers` layer #60549
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Disallow 'nameof(field)' #60384
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Completion textedits cursor #60499
    Area-IDE
  • Move few `CodeFixProvider`s to Analyzers layer #60524
    Area-Analyzers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No way to pass build arguments to WebApplicationFactory as is #41039
  • Debugging Blazor WASM after publish #41033
  • ASP0001 warning when used inside app.MapWhen #41030
  • SymmetricSecurityKey used in JwtBearer TokenValidationParameters does not implement RFC2104 key padding #41024

Closed

  • Blazor server - Using IJSStreamReference after browser reconnect throws "Cannot send data if the connection is not in the 'Connected' State" #40608
    7.0-preview3
  • Consider aliasing user-secrets CLI command as dev-secrets #39897
  • Consider enhancements to MVC for a grow up story from minimal actions #33403
    7.0-preview4
  • Razor Component weird namespace issue #40861
  • Suggest to add npm client package management template #41018
  • [BLAZOR] WASM 404 when deployed to IIS #41028
  • DataProtection aka.ms link go to the repo #41029
  • How to display a image in local? #41022
  • [Razor] Identifier for CSS Isolation not always appears in HTML tag #40996
  • Nesting AuthorizeView and Authorized components with various roles #41011
  • Upgrade `Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect` dependency to use none-blocking method `ValidateTokenAsync` #40748
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4.22204.1 #41038
    area-infrastructure
  • Output caching middleware #41037
  • Make IResult constructor public #41035
    area-runtime
  • Handle arm64 in ANCMIISExpress msi #41034
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix for issue 40774 RequestDelegateFactory null param default #41025
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • **DISABLE_SECRET_SCANNING** #41031
    7.0-preview3

Updated

  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • Backport UseProgramMain template option #40945
    blocked, area-mvc, ask-mode, 6.0.x
  • Switch to built-in IsTrimmable property #41021
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • sos messages should not assume windbg context #2978
  • dotnet-stack should filter out its immediate parent `dotnet` process if any #2977
  • dotnet-dump should show error message for OS errors #2976
  • Dotnet-dump analyze shows "unknown" function name for my application symbols - public symbols resolve #2973

Closed

  • Command 'dotnet-xxxx ps' throws exception on Windows-x64 #2946
  • dotnet-counters monitor on Windows powershell and cmd prints various incorrectly formatted outputs #2970

PullRequests

Merged

  • dotnet-tool ps case with no supported managed processes #2979
    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, dotnet-stack, .NET 7.0
  • Fix rendering issues on dotnet-tool ps #2972
    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, .NET 7.0
  • patch to fix dotnet-counters rendering issues #2971
    dotnet-counters, .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LinearGradientBrush crashes app on launch on iOS #5812
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Can't Change Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor From a Theme Style File #5808
  • Can't use JS interop outside the context of a component in MAUI #5804
    .NET 7
  • Editor CursorPosition goes to start after adding any character to text #5803
  • Linux Wayland support #5801
    Future
  • WebView inside a StackLayout height calculation differs between Windows and Android. #5799
  • Editor WidthRequest does not work on iOS #5792
  • Editor's SizeChanged event does not get called #5791

Closed

  • [Windows] Crash on SwipeView setting the SwipeMode #4292
    6.0.300
  • IWindow.VisualDiagnosticsOverlay.Density is always 1 #5334
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView MAUI targets don't copy item metadata for *.razor files #5713
  • Blazor Maui project using Razor component with SkiaSharp fail #5725
  • Blazor Maui project calling JS function in Razor component using generated code ExampleJsInterop fail. #5726
  • BlazorWinFormsApp and BlazorWpfApp throw NullReferenceException when using ExampleJsInterop in .NET 6 Preview 3 #1245
    .NET 7
  • FontImageSource displays small box instead of requested font icon #5157
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Folder YOUR_APP.exe.WebView2 is always created by BlazorWebView #5779
  • Only MotionEventActions.Down in PlatformGraphisView? #5259
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Can not File.ReadAllText a json file #5796
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar in HorizontalStackLayout Crashes on App on Startup #5346
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • No Maui Project Template and error: Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks #5778
  • iFrame Automatically Opens Source in New Window at Initialization (iOS Blazor WebView) #5784
  • The screen is white on iOS when using Shell #5786
  • 'System.PlatformNotSupportedException', reason: 'Operation is not supported on this platform. (System.PlatformNotSupportedException) #5788
  • Why the namespace can not be found in maui Playforms but still compile success? #5785
  • The remote iOS simulator hangs with black screen #5787

PullRequests

Created

  • Updating TargetFrameworks condition value #5813
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
  • Remove NETSTANDARD1 defines #5809
  • Remove trivial calls to GetTypeInfo #5807

  • [Android] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #5789

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash setting Execute mode in Windows SwipeItems #5798
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView
  • Update BlazorWebViewHandler.Android.cs #5777
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Wire up WindowOverlay to the Window Density #5718

  • Essentials Location Permissions Set result after cleanup of iOS LocationManager #5795

  • Rename ApplicationId to ApplicationIdGuid for Windows #5695
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix ResourceDictionary template #5736
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.1

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Fixing image shadows on Windows #5763

  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020

  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708

  • Made MaxLength property consistent across all platforms #5581

  • BlazorWebView public API tracking #5672

  • Run all navigation through async update #5744

  • Fix Android Radio Button #5773

  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 1 : 1 From a Table to a DB View - Cannot delete the row from the Table #27754
  • Can't generate a migration bundle when using IronPdf for Linux. The "GenerateBundle" task failed unexpectedly. #27753
  • Allow pooling DbContext with singleton services #27752
  • Why do you recommend for EF to create and maintain its own IServiceProvider for internal EF services? #27751
  • DbSet<T>.Local.Count not updated when calling ChangeTracker.Clear() #27750
  • Allow uniquification to be turned off #27747
  • Disable automatic 'order by' in query to decrease execution time #27746

Closed

  • .Take(0) after .Skip(n>0) causes an SqlException on SQL Server #27730
  • Remove System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource and System.Collections.Immutable for reference and runtime pack version. #27715
    7.0.0
  • Allow migrations bundle executable to run arbitrary script. #27701
  • The IMigrationsModelDiffer.GetDifferences behaves differently on Linux #27734

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove needless package references in EFCore. #27720
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Add Migration name check #26396
  • Add TPC support to update pipeline #27737
  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error whilst uninstalling .NET 6 SDK - api-ms-win-core-path-l1-1-0.dll is missing #13527

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add arm64 leg to source-build CI #13500
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13518
